backend/main.mo: Primary Motoko actor defining state, types, and CRUD logic for users, episodes, characters, clans, gallery, news, and scripts with access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new episode format, mapping fields and injecting defaults for new properties.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend updates, affected files, components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality and roles of various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables and global styling definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling hash-based routing between the marketing site and admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Access gate that checks identity and admin status to show login, unauthorized message, or the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Renders the main admin dashboard with tabs for managing content panels and a header with navigation and login controls. Conditionally includes the team panel based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cha: Provides UI and logic for listing, creating, editing, and deleting characters with metadata encoding. Supports clan selection and character metadata handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Cla: Allows admins to view, create, edit, and delete clans with encoded metadata. Includes form dialogs and error handling for clan content management.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Epi: Manages episodes with creation, editing, deletion, reordering, thumbnail uploads, and character tagging. Handles visibility settings and progress states for production steps.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Gal: Supports CRUD for gallery items with image upload, metadata encoding, and preview handling. Provides dialogs for creating and editing gallery entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/New: Admin panel for listing, creating, editing, and deleting news posts with form validation and query mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Scr: Admin interface to manage scripts, including creation, editing, deletion, and permission-based error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/panels/Tea: Admin tool for listing team members and granting or revoking roles, with validation and authorization checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and automatic query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Displays a character's portrait, clan styling, and details with animated presentation and motion‑sensitive effects.
Small badge showing a clan's name and accent color with subtle animated effects.
frontend/src/components/clans/ClanCard.t: Animated card presenting a clan's sigil, badge, and description with hover effects and motion‑aware visuals.
frontend/src/components/episodes/Episode: Card showing episode metadata, release status, and an optional watch button.
Modal dialog that displays episode details and either a playable video or an unavailable alert.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Renders a filterable grid of gallery images with optional category tabs and click handling.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Full-screen lightbox viewer with keyboard navigation and previous/next controls for gallery images.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryU: Dialog for uploading new gallery images with drag-and-drop, validation, and metadata submission.
frontend/src/components/news/NewPostForm: Form for creating a news post with validation, error display, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsPostCar: Displays a formatted news post with title, author, timestamp, and content.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Animated about section highlighting story context and three feature cards with icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Charact: Fetches and decodes character data, displays loading/error states, and renders CharacterCard components with scroll-based animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClansSe: Loads clan data, merges backend metadata with static styling, handles loading/error states, and renders ClanCard components plus an embedded world map section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Episode: Retrieves and decodes episode data, sorts episodes, handles watch actions with gating for unreleased content, and renders EpisodeCard components and a player dialog.
Renders the site footer with brand info, quick navigation links, social icons, and scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Loads and decodes gallery items, supports admin uploads, displays a gallery grid with lightbox navigation, and handles loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeaderN: Implements a responsive navigation bar with scroll detection, smooth section navigation, mobile menu, and an admin link when authorized.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the landing hero section with parallax background, animated particles, gradients, and introductory title content. Uses motion preferences and DOM manipulation to create floating particle effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/NewsUpd: Displays a news feed with authentication, profile setup, admin post creation, and sorted news posts. Handles loading states, errors, and a modal for entering a user profile name.
frontend/src/components/sections/WorldMa: Renders an SVG overlay of clickable map hotspots tied to location data. Manages hotspot refs, keyboard accessibility, and motion‑aware visual effects.
Shows a modal dialog presenting lore details for a selected map location. Includes region metadata, close controls, and styled text content.
Combines the world map image, clickable hotspots, and lore dialog into an interactive map section. Handles selection, dialog state, focus return, and enter‑on‑scroll animations.
frontend/src/data/characters.ts: Defines a Character interface and exports a list of character entries describing their clan, personality, powers, and narrative roles. Used as static data for character-related features.
frontend/src/data/clans.ts: Defines a Clan interface and a list of clan metadata including names, descriptions, colors, and sigil paths.
frontend/src/data/episodes.ts: Defines Episode interface and provides Season 1 episode data with titles, summaries, and release status.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Defines gallery item structure and exports a small set of gallery items and category list.
frontend/src/data/worldMapLocations.ts: Defines map location interface and exports detailed lore-based map location data with coordinates and SVG shapes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Provides a hook that applies scroll-based parallax effects with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, episodes, and related mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Hook for revealing elements when scrolled into view using IntersectionObserver with reduced-motion fallback.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, theme CSS variables, and custom anime‑style glow, shimmer, pulse, fade, and float utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context and loads global styles.
Provides helpers to encode/decode metadata in text fields and retrieve clan styling defaults.
frontend/src/utils/galleryImageUpload.ts: Validates image uploads for size/type and converts files to data URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors, shadows, radii, and enabling plugins and CSS variable‑driven color system.
project_state.json: Describes project goals, architecture notes, issues, and existing features for the anime website.
